titles.title: Landfill Gas Act of 2006
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit against tax proportional to the number of million British thermal units of natural gas produced by a high Btu fuel facility.
Landfill Gas Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Landfill Gas Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a business-related tax credit for the production of natural gas at a high Btu fuel facility (a facility that produces high Btu biomass fuel and is placed in service before January 1, 2012).
